extensionPricing.name: Free
limitations:
Scheduled messages will be
sent only when WhatsApp Web is open and connected.

extensionPricing.name: Basic
limitations:
Scheduled messages will be
sent only when WhatsApp Web is open and connected.
extensionPricing.tip: *Ideal if you need to schedule unlimited messages and can keep WhatsApp Web active.

extensionPricing.name: Standard
limitations:
Scheduled messages will be
sent only when WhatsApp Web is open and connected.
extensionPricing.tip: *Perfect for those who want to manage both unlimited messages and tasks seamlessly.

extensionPricing.name: Pro
benefits: Scheduled messages will be sent regardless of whether WhatsApp Web is closed or not.
extensionPricing.tip: *Best for advanced users who need to send campaigns without branding and prefer the flexibility to schedule messages without keeping their computer on.

planSelection.freeLimitOffline: Browser-Only Sending - Must keep WhatsApp Web open
planSelection.freeLimitTasks: Up to 2 boards, 10 tasks per board
